
Citation and Acknowledgement
=====================================================================

Some data have been already used in published papers. The papers to cite are listed in the table of each case. Also, please describe supports by Computational Infrastructure for Geodynamics (CIG), UC Davis and Innovative and Novel Computational Impact on Theory and Experiment (INCITE) program.

Here is an example of text for acknowledgement from Heimpel et al. (2022)

	"Computational Infrastructure for Geodynamics (CIG) and UC Davis provided logistical support as well as data hosting. Computational simulations were carried out on the ALCF Mira supercomputer (DE-AC02-06CH11357) through the Innovative and Novel Computational Impact on Theory and Experiment (INCITE) program."
